'''Caution in Confidence''' is a [[Character Event Wish]] in [[Version 3.7]].

==Wish Details==
===Duration===
* 2023-06-13 18:00:00 &ndash; 2023-07-04 14:59:59

===Summary===
* During this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character "Admonishing Instruction" [[Alhaitham]] ({{Dendro}}) will get a huge drop-rate boost!
* During this event wish, the 4-star characters "Burgeoning Grace" [[Yaoyao]] ({{Dendro}}), "Analytical Harmony" [[Shikanoin Heizou]] ({{Anemo}}), and "Exquisite Delicacy" [[Xiangling]] ({{Pyro}}) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!
* Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]."
* For information about rates, see [[Wish]]es.
